div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where constraint = ^446608001,<91723000

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server)
CodeDisplay
87100004Topography unknown
21229009Topography not assigned
Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/icd-o-3 version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept descends from T (Topografía)

description.value: Set de valores utilizados para la topografía, estos pueden ser mapeados de Snomed CT a la CIE-O 3 Tográfico o ser usado directamente en CIE-O 3 Tográfico
